targets.rawSql: SELECT zeitstempel, sensor_id, spannung FROM CaravanPiValues.spannung WHERE sensor_id = '12vbord' ORDER BY zeitstempel DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT zeitstempel, sensor_id AS "Bordbatterie", spannung FROM CaravanPiValues.spannung WHERE sensor_id = '12vbord' ORDER BY zeitstempel DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT zeitstempel, sensor_id, spannung FROM CaravanPiValues.spannung WHERE sensor_id = '230v' ORDER BY zeitstempel DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT spannung FROM CaravanPiValues.spannung WHERE sensor_id = '230v' ORDER BY zeitstempel DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT zeitstempel AS "time", sensor_id, temperatur FROM CaravanPiValues.klimasensor WHERE sensor_id = 'BME280-96119' ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel AS "time", sensor_id, temperatur FROM CaravanPiValues.klimasensor WHERE sensor_id = 'BME280-96118' ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel AS "time", sensor_id, temperatur FROM CaravanPiValues.temperatursensor WHERE sensor_id = 'DS1820-28-01203392085f' ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel AS "time", sensor_id, temperatur FROM CaravanPiValues.temperatursensor WHERE sensor_id = 'DS1820-28-012032d4dd5a' ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel AS "time", sensor_id, temperatur FROM CaravanPiValues.temperatursensor WHERE sensor_id = 'DS1820-28-012033251e15' ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel, sensor_id, spannung FROM CaravanPiValues.spannung GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY zeitstempel DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT zeitstempel, sensor_id, gewicht FROM CaravanPiValues.gasfuellgrad ORDER BY zeitstempel ASC LIMIT 5000
